20110110053034.000|20110110053039.000|CC1|TIME OUR WORK RUNNING ERRANDS ON
20110110053039.000|20110110053044.000|CC1|WHAT WOULD HAVE BEEN AN         
20110110053044.000|20110110053049.000|CC1|ORDINARY WEEKEND.               
20110110053049.000|20110110053050.000|CC1|THIS WAS AN ATTACK ON OUR       
20110110053050.000|20110110053052.000|CC1|INSTITUTIONS AND OUR WAY OF

20110110053054.000|20110110053055.000|CC1|AS YOU KNOW, JARED LOUGHNER,    
20110110053055.000|20110110053057.000|CC1|WAS SUBDUED BY BRAVE QUICK

20110110053113.000|20110110053115.000|CC1|HEINOUS ACT AND IF ANYONE ELSE

20110110053120.000|20110110053122.000|CC1|THE ANSWERS TO THESE QUESTIONS, 
20110110053122.000|20110110053124.000|CC1|I CAN ASSURE YOU THAT TEAMS OF  
20110110053124.000|20110110053125.000|CC1|PROFESSIONALS ARE WORKING

20110110053128.000|20110110053130.000|CC1|THAT IS TO -- SINGLE GOAL.      
20110110053130.000|20110110053138.000|CC1|THAT IS TO FIND THE FACTS AND   
20110110053138.000|20110110053140.000|CC1|ENSURE THAT JUSTICE IS DONE.

20110110053142.000|20110110053143.000|CC1|PRECAUTIONS ARE IN PLACE TO     
20110110053143.000|20110110053147.000|CC1|BEST INSURE THE SAFETY OF OTHER 
20110110053147.000|20110110053150.000|CC1|PUBLIC OFFICIALS.
